venue.address_1: Rt 62 and Lower Sawyer Hill Road
venue.name: Berlin Orchards

item.description:
Join us for a fun day of apple picking at Berlin Orchards. There is a short hayride (free) to the apple orchards. Enjoy the fresh air and sweet apples. We will meet near the entrance where you purchase apple picking bags.


$15 - a peck (10 lbs) (can be shared with another person)
$25 - 1/2 a bushel (20 lbs)

Free parking, no entrance fee

Transportation is your own responsibility. However, we will try to arrange carpools for you if possible. If you need a ride, please indicate when you RSVP. Let us know what city/town and/or T stop you are at. Members may contact each other re: carpools.

Berlin Orchards is about 40 miles from Boston.

Drive Directions:
Please visit this site http://www.berlinorch...

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Apple Picking - Saturday
